definition: cooking method/to boil sb alive (capital punishment in imperial China)
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: To shorten the time, the rapid thermal burn cooking pot is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 若想缩短时间，断热烹调的焖烧锅值得推荐。

sentences.english: Our guide, who was a French Canadian, was an excellent cook.
sentences.chinese: 我们的向导是一个法裔加拿大人，他很擅长烹调。

sentences.english: Crumple a sheet of cooking paper, flatten it, and then place it over the pan.
sentences.chinese: 揉皱一页烹调用纸，再拉平它，然后放在锅上。

sentences.english: Although there was little food in the house, Jean concocted a splendid meal.
sentences.chinese: 虽然家里只有少许食物，珍仍然烹调了一顿盛餐。

sentences.english: I bread the fish before I cook it.
sentences.chinese: 我在烹调鱼之前会先把它裹上面包粉。

sentences.english: Thaw out the frozen meat before cooking.
sentences.chinese: 把冻肉化冻后再进行烹调。

sentences.english: In America I can buy and cook it when I want--Roza
sentences.chinese: 在美国，当我想要时，我就可以买来后烹调它。

sentences.english: Enzymes are destroyed at temperatures of 104 degrees F (40 degrees C).
sentences.chinese: 活酶在温度为40摄氏度下烹调，会失去功效。

sentences.english: Properly cooked, they're as tender as butter.
sentences.chinese: 适当烹调后，肉质像黄油般滑嫩。

sentences.english: The cooking here is very satisfactory.
A solution may soon come from using waste cooking oil.
sentences.chinese: 不久就会拥有解决方法，用废烹调油生产生物柴油。

sentences.english: To make sure of nothing going wrong, my mother would superintend the cooking herself.
sentences.chinese: 为确保一切不出问题，我母亲会亲自下伙房监督烹调。

sentences.english: It is used to cook food and sterilize water.
sentences.chinese: 用它来烹调食物和水消毒。

sentences.english: The escargots are cooked in butter and garlic.
sentences.chinese: 这份田螺是由奶油和大蒜烹调而成的。

sentences.english: How do you prevent loofah from turning black?
sentences.chinese: 丝瓜要如何烹调较不易变黑？

sentences.english: This year my mother will cook a twenty-five pound turkey.
sentences.chinese: 本年我妈妈会烹调一个二十五磅的火鸡。

definition: to stir-fry/to do the cooking/stir-fried dish
